tab1_text: Mapstories emerged as a collaboration between re:edu GmbH & Co.KG and Vamos e.V. The project began with a co-creative lab on the global garment industry. Mapstories is a web-based open-source tool that allows students to independently engage in development education related to the aforementioned topic. With its ability to visually create systemic connections, Mapstories can be particularly useful in the context of education for sustainable development, providing a comprehensive view of global issues.
tab3_text: Call for support in cooperation projects
tab4_text: Do you want to showcase in the digital space the places or projects that promote social cohesion and how they are interconnected? And do you want to do it based on your own specific themes? We offer online training sessions for using the platform, tailored to different target groups. An initial introduction to the platform, along with exploring its features and developing your own ideas for the first Mapstory, takes approximately 90 minutes. The costs vary depending on the context and complexity, ranging from €100 to €250. For inquiries, please contact: mapstories@vamos-muenster.de
